ygData.subject: Re: Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Man why don t you leave her alone, everyone in the game isn t gonna fight there way to the top some people play that way. Play the game yourself and do your
ygData.messageBody:
Man why don't you leave her alone, everyone in the game isn't gonna fight
there way to the top some people play that way. Play the game yourself and
do your thing. It's kind of painfull to get a 30 day suspension. If you
really want to do harm to someone look for the people exploiting bugs and
stuff like that not some tiny little thing like tweaking their characters
and you never know she might have had something happen to her like for
example a friend of mine refused to pay a toll in freeport and the guard
attacked him so he killed the guard now he can't walk into freeport because
the guards kill him so he made a new character and transfered all his stuff
to his new character. Find things out or just mind your own buisness before
messing up a persons gaming. Her tweaking isn't doing you any damage so just
leave it alone.

I mean no disrespect by it but it just bothersme to see people who have a
fit out of nothing.

>From: "Neil Lambert" <smartass@...>
>Reply-To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
>Date: Sun, 23 May 1999 21:05:47 -0700
>
>i saw her again today
>
>lol she tried to lie her way out of it (like this is even remotely
>believable) she says she just knows how to play well! lol... i wish i
>remembered her name! GMs give a 30 day suspension for twinking muahaha
>
>anyone remember if i included her name in the original post?
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Simon Hinshelwood <iktome@...>
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Date: Sunday, May 23, 1999 6:36 AM
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
>
>
> Oh oh its started! The slippery downward slope into UO?
> Simon
>
>
>
> shypht wrote:
>
> The wonderfull world of twinking. In a way I dont care if people do
>this, I have seen lvl 15 in oracle robes which are found of of lvl 40ish
>mobs I think. But, what I dont like is how guilds "take over" an item spawn
>site to supply all of their lower lvls with items takeing away the chacne
>that others have to get the items.
